describe: You walk into the depths of the forest. You notice a small colony of [mushrooms] growing on an old piece of rotting wood, a [squirrel] eating an [acorn] and a [bush].
In the distance you see a [road].

bush.look: The bush is covered in small [berries]

responses.talk: this is my first response to the first question

npc.talk: this is the response to your response from the first question here's a [large banana]

responses.talk: this is my second response to the first question

npc.talk: this is his response to your second response from teh first question
